verses.roman:
eta kahi' mahāprabhu tāṅre vidāya dila
ghare āsi' mahāprabhura śikṣā ācarila

synonyms: eta kahi'-saying this; mahāprabhu—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; tāṅre—unto Raghunātha dāsa; vidāya dila—bade farewell; ghare āsi'-returning home; mahāprabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; śikṣā—the instruction; ācarila—practiced.
translation: In this way, Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu bade farewell to Raghunātha dāsa, who returned home and did exactly what the Lord told him.
